majorIsMoreThanJustABusiness: Major is more than just a business
firstMissionParagraph: This is a family business that unites us all in a common desire to create truly effective products.
secondMissionParagraph: We have a small but powerful team, where everyone is responsible for their own process: from creating formulas and testing to packaging and customer consultation.
thirdMissionParagraph1: For us, Ukrainian is not a trend or a slogan.
thirdMissionParagraph2: This is a matter of life. We create it with our own hands. And at the same time, we protect it.
thirdMissionParagraph3: Because love is not just words, it is actions.
originStorySectionTitle: When the world stopped, we started
originStorySectionFirstParagraph: In 2019, during the pandemic, the world came to a standstill, the doors of the salons closed, but women's desire to take care of themselves did not disappear.
originStorySectionSecondParagraph2: If you cannot get to the salon, we will create a salon at home. It was then that the idea of creating products that would provide a salon effect at home was born.
brandValuesImgBgAlt: A background that depicts the brand's values
brandValuesFirstParagraph1: MAJOR is a name that matters.
brandValuesFirstParagraph2: We've been looking for a single word that we could feel in our hearts for a long time. It means «main» - that's how we see our products in our daily care.
brandValuesSecondParagraph2: The strength of women, the strength of the family, the strength of the country. This is not just cosmetics, but a manifestation of care, faith and the inner core of each of us.
brandValuesThirdParagraph1: MAJOR is more than a business.
brandValuesThirdParagraph2: This is a family business created out of love and care. We have a small but close-knit team, united by a common goal - to help every woman take care of herself easily.
brandValuesFourthParagraph1: MAJOR is a choice in favor of Ukraine.
brandValuesFourthParagraph2: We produce everything in Ukraine, create jobs, pay taxes and support the Armed Forces of Ukraine. Every purchase is a contribution to a strong, independent country.
keyBenefitsMainParagraph: We don't want to be just another hair cosmetics brand. Our goal is to create products that actually solve hair problems, not mask them. Therefore, we set ourselves several important principles:
keyBenefitsDescription1: During the consultation, we determine the needs of your skin and hair, so the result will not be long in coming!
keyBenefitsDescription2: Instead of dozens of jars, everything you need is in a few products. Simple care that works.
keyBenefitsDescription3: Our products eliminate dandruff, reduce oiliness and itching, improve hair growth and add thickness.
keyBenefitsDescription4: Our products eliminate dandruff, reduce oiliness and itching, improve hair growth and add thickness.
keyBenefitsDescription5: Each product has a convenient dispenser and instructions for use on the back.
keyBenefitsDescription6: With each subsequent wash, the result improves, the hair is restored before our eyes!
